preconditions.precondition: User must have the Alastria application installed on the mobile

mainSequence.step: User installs the Alastria application on the mobile
User requests a session token from Associate_Web
Associate_Web prepares a JSON object with the registration in Alastria
Associate_Web sends the JSON retrieval URL to PushMovileManager
PushMovileManager pushes the JSON retrieval URL to User
User requests the public key recovery from the application
Gateway forwards the public key recovery request to MetaIdentityManager
MetaIdentityManager forwards the request to Proxy
Proxy retrieves the user's public key from Registry
Registry returns the public key associated with the user's alastria_id to Gateway
Gateway provides the user with the public key associated with the alastria_id
User verifies the JSON object signature
Gateway creates the user's alastria_id
Gateway registers the user's public key in the Registry
User creates keys
User publishes the public key in the Registry
User includes testimonies
User requests the testimonies provided by the partner
Associate_Web constructs the user's testimonies (Signed JSON)
Associate_Web sends the URL of the testimonies recovery to PushMovileManager
PushMovileManager notifies the user with the testimonies recovery URL
User verifies the JSON object signature of the testimonies
User accepts and signs the testimonies
User stores the testimonies in the Repository
User registers the attributes in the Registry
